response.original_title: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League EP2
response.overview: Episode 2 takes us to the Cido Arena in Panevézys, Lithuania. Women’s endurance legends, Katie Archibald and Kirsten Wild go head to head in the elimination race, and we learn more about Archibald’s background in her hometown of Glasgow. Speedy Kiwi, Corbin Strong, shows us that what he lacked on the rugby pitch, he more than makes up for on the boards, and German’s Emma Hinze and Lea Friedrich continue their struggle to find a balance between friendship and rivalry.
response.title: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League EP2

results.name: Back On Track - UCI Track Champions League
